body:
This PR will  add Nek5000 - a fast high order spectral element CFD solver
to Spack package manager as part of CEED software suite.

This is still a work in progress, so please don't merge.

## Current status

This PR can successfully install Nek5000 tools and load tools + makenek file
with `module load`.

## TODO

- [x] Add the remaining tools as well.
- [x] Set MPI, PROFILING and VISIT parameters in `makenek` appropriately
- [x]  See what other CEED related constraints should be satisfied by this PR.
- [x] Test with all the versions
title: Adding Nek5000 to Spack
